purpose: Zookeeper service

source: Internal clients on platform connecting to Zookeeper.

source: Kubernetes worker node VM on platform
serviceDescription: Kubernetes server process listening to worker requests to form cluster.

source: Nginx web server (admin-nginx container) on platform
serviceDescription: Deploy Server internally exposing REST endpoint for deployment requests. For all worker nodes the service/port is shutdown after 1st time use setup of the environment. For the control-plane node the service is shutdown on an invalid POST attempt.
purpose: Internal communication port for deployment REST requests from Nginx web proxy

serviceDescription: Nginx web proxy (admin-nginx container) receives deployment requests and provides deployment status.
purpose: Inbound communication port receives deployment requests viz. POST to initiate cluster deployment and GET deployment status. Proxies these to backend Deploy Server running on port 4960 on control plane node.
